creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: iron barrel with carved cranes and family crests; wood stock applied with plates carved as Chinese lions and peonies; ram rod missing stock with minor cracks
medium: Wooden stock with brazen inlays, engraved and painted octagonal iron barrel
title: Matchlock rifle (hinawajū)
